title: Cornered skein lasagna theory
summary: We extend the skein lasagna theory of Morrison-Walker-Wedrich to 4-manifolds with corners and formulate gluing formulas for 4-manifolds with boundary and, more generally, with corners. As an application, we develop a categorical framework for a presentation of the skein lasagna module of trisected closed 4-manifolds. Further, we extend the theory to dimension two by introducing bicategories for closed oriented surfaces and proving a gluing formula for the categories associated with 3-manifolds with boundary.

AI.tldr: 将skein lasagna理论扩展到带角点的4维流形，建立了边界和角点流形的粘合公式，并发展了闭4维流形三分解的范畴框架
AI.motivation: 扩展Morrison-Walker-Wedrich的skein lasagna理论，使其能够处理更一般的4维流形结构，特别是带有边界和角点的流形，以建立更完整的数学框架
AI.method: 1. 将skein lasagna理论推广到带角点的4维流形；2. 为边界和角点流形建立粘合公式；3. 为闭4维流形三分解发展范畴框架；4. 将理论扩展到二维，引入闭定向曲面的双范畴
AI.result: 成功建立了带角点4维流形的skein lasagna理论，获得了边界和角点流形的粘合公式，为闭4维流形三分解提供了范畴框架，并将理论扩展到二维曲面
AI.conclusion: 该工作扩展了skein lasagna理论的应用范围，建立了更一般的数学框架，为研究4维流形的拓扑性质提供了新的工具和方法

title: Multiparameter quantum general linear supergroup
comment: 31 pages - Keywords: Quantum Groups, Quantum Function Algebras
summary: We introduce uniparametric and multiparametric quantisations of the general linear supergroup, in the form of "quantised function algebras", both in a formal setting -- yielding "quantum formal series Hopf superalgebras", a` la Drinfeld - and in a polynomial one -- closer to Manin's point of view. In the uniparametric setting, we start from quantised universal enveloping superalgebras over gl(n) -- endowed with a super-structure -- as in [Ya1] and [Zha]: through a direct approach, we construct their linear dual, thus finding the quantum formal series Hopf superalgebras mentioned above, which are described in detail via an explicit presentation. Starting from the latter, then, we perform a deformation by a well-chosen 2-cocycle, thus getting a multiparametric quantisation, described again by an explicit presentation: this is, in turn, the dual to the multiparametric quantised universal enveloping algebra over gl(n) from [GGP]. We also provide some "polynomial versions" of these quantisations, both for the uniparametric and the multiparametric case. In particular, we compare the latter to Manin's quantum function algebras from [Ma].

AI.tldr: 该论文介绍了单参数和多参数的一般线性超群量子化，构建了量子形式级数Hopf超代数和多项式量子函数代数，建立了量子包络超代数与量子函数代数之间的对偶关系。
AI.motivation: 研究一般线性超群的量子化，扩展Drinfeld和Manin的量子群理论到超对称情形，建立单参数和多参数量子化之间的系统联系。
AI.method: 1. 从gl(n)的单参数量子包络超代数出发，通过直接方法构造其对偶的量子形式级数Hopf超代数；2. 通过精心选择的2-上循环进行形变，得到多参数量子化；3. 提供单参数和多参数情况下的多项式版本量子化。
AI.result: 成功构建了单参数和多参数的一般线性超群量子化，给出了明确的代数表示，建立了与[GGP]中多参数量子包络代数的对偶关系，并与Manin的量子函数代数进行了比较。
AI.conclusion: 该研究系统地发展了一般线性超群的量子化理论，建立了单参数和多参数量子化之间的转换机制，为超对称量子群理论提供了新的数学框架。

title: Twisted bimodules and associative algebras associated to VOAs
summary: Let $V$ be a vertex operator algebra, $g$ be an automorphism of $V$ of order $T$, and $m, n \in (1/T)\mathbb{N}$. In~\cite{HX2} and~\cite{HXX1}, it was shown respectively that the associative algebra $A_{g,n}(V)$ constructed by Dong, Li, and Mason~\cite{DLM3}, and the $A_{g,n}(V)\!-\!A_{g,m}(V)$-bimodule $A_{g,n,m}(V)$ constructed by Dong and Jiang~\cite{DJ2}, are both isomorphic to certain subquotients of $U(V[g])$, where $U(V[g])$ denotes the universal enveloping algebra of $V$ with respect to $g$. In this paper, we give a unified and concise proof of these isomorphisms.

AI.tldr: 本文为顶点算子代数中$A_{g,n}(V)$和$A_{g,n,m}(V)$与$U(V[g])$子商同构的统一简洁证明
AI.motivation: 先前研究已分别证明了$A_{g,n}(V)$代数和$A_{g,n,m}(V)$双模与$U(V[g])$的特定子商同构，但证明分散在不同文献中
AI.method: 提供统一且简洁的证明方法，将先前分散的证明整合为一个更简洁的论证
AI.result: 成功给出了$A_{g,n}(V)$和$A_{g,n,m}(V)$与$U(V[g])$子商同构的统一证明
AI.conclusion: 通过统一简洁的证明，简化了顶点算子代数中这些重要结构的同构关系理解

title: Integral cluster structures on quantized coordinate rings
summary: We develop (quantum) cluster algebra structures over arbitrary commutative unital rings $\Bbbk$ and prove that the (quantized) coordinate rings of connected simply-connected complex simple algebraic groups $G$ over $\Bbbk$ admit such structures. We first show that the integral form of the quantized coordinate ring of $G$ admits an upper quantum cluster algebra structure over $\mathbb{A}=\mathbb{Z}[q^{\pm\frac{1}{2}}]$ by using a combination of tools from quantum groups, canonical bases and cluster algebras and a previous result of the second and third authors over $\mathbb{Q}(q^{\frac{1}{2}})$. We then obtain (integral) quantum versions of recent results of the first author: when $G$ is not of type $F_4$, the quantized coordinate ring of $G$ admits a quantum cluster algebra structure over $\mathbb{A}'$, where $\mathbb{A}'=\mathbb{A}$ when $G$ is not of types $G_2$, $E_8$, and $F_4$; $\mathbb{A}'=\mathbb{A}[(q^2+1)^{-1}]$ when $G$ is of type $G_2$, and $\mathbb{A}'=\mathbb{Q}(q^{\frac{1}{2}})$ when $G$ is of type $E_8$. We furthermore prove that the classical versions of these results hold over $\mathbb{A}'$ (where $\mathbb{A}'=\mathbb{Z}$ if $G$ is not of type $F_4$ or $G_2$ and $\mathbb{A}'=\mathbb{Z}[\frac{1}{2}]$ if $G$ is of type $G_2$) and that the integral form of the coordinate ring of $G$ of type $F_4$ is an upper cluster algebra. Finally, by using common triangular bases of (quantum) cluster algebras, we prove that the above results also hold under specializations of $\mathbb{A}$ and $\mathbb{A}'$ to commutative unital rings $\Bbbk$.

AI.tldr: 该论文在任意交换幺环上发展了(量子)丛代数结构，证明了连通单连通复单代数群的(量子)坐标环具有此类结构，并建立了积分形式的上量子丛代数结构。
AI.motivation: 研究量子群、典范基和丛代数之间的联系，将量子丛代数结构推广到更一般的系数环上，为代数群的坐标环建立统一的丛代数理论框架。
AI.method: 结合量子群、典范基和丛代数的工具，利用作者先前在有理函数域上的结果，通过积分形式构造上量子丛代数结构，并使用三角基证明结果在系数环特殊化下的稳定性。
AI.result: 证明了除F4型外的所有单连通复单代数群的量子坐标环在特定系数环上具有量子丛代数结构，经典版本的结果在相应系数环上也成立，F4型代数群的坐标环积分形式是上丛代数。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功建立了代数群坐标环的量子丛代数结构理论，将结果推广到任意交换幺环上，深化了对量子群、典范基和丛代数之间关系的理解。

title: Unipotent quantum coordinate ring and minuscule prefundamental representations: twisted case
comment: v2: 29 pages, revised proof of Theorem 6.7, minor corrections; v1: 28 pages
summary: We study the prefundamental modules $L_{s,a}^{\pm}$ over the Borel subalgebras of the twisted quantum loop algebras, which are introduced by Wang. A character formula for $L_{s,a}^{\pm}$ is obtained from that for the prefundamental modules over the untwisted quantum loop algebras by applying a character folding map. This allows us to realize minuscule prefundamental modules $L_{s,a}^{\pm}$ for types $A_{2n-1}^{(2)}$ and $D_{n+1}^{(2)}$ in terms of the unipotent quantum coordinate ring associated with the $s$-th level $0$ fundamental weight, where $s = 1$ for type $A_{2n-1}^{(2)}$ and $s = n$ for type $D_{n+1}^{(2)}$. This result is a continuation of the realization of (co)minuscule prefundamental modules established by earlier works [J-Kwon-Park, Int. Math. Res. Not., 2023] and [J-Kwon-Park, J. Algebra, 2025].

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了扭曲量子环代数Borel子代数上的预基本模，通过特征折叠映射从非扭曲情况推导出特征公式，并在特定类型下用单量子坐标环实现极小预基本模。
AI.motivation: 研究扭曲量子环代数Borel子代数上的预基本模，扩展先前关于（共）极小预基本模实现的工作，建立扭曲与非扭曲情况之间的联系。
AI.method: 应用特征折叠映射，从非扭曲量子环代数的预基本模特征公式推导扭曲情况的特征公式；在特定类型下，通过单量子坐标环实现极小预基本模。
AI.result: 获得了扭曲量子环代数Borel子代数上预基本模的特征公式；在A_{2n-1}^{(2)}和D_{n+1}^{(2)}类型下，用与第s级0基本权相关的单量子坐标环实现了极小预基本模。
AI.conclusion: 该工作扩展了预基本模的实现理论，建立了扭曲与非扭曲量子环代数之间的联系，为相关代数结构的研究提供了新工具。

title: Noncommutative Geometry of Gravity, Strings and Fields: A Panoramic Overview
comment: 69 pages; v2: presentation expanded and improved, typos corrected, references added; Based on lectures given at the conference "Applications of Noncommutative Geometry to Gauge Theories, Field Theories, and Quantum Spacetime", CIRM, Marseille, 7-11 April 2025; to be published in EMS Series of Lectures in Mathematics
summary: These are expanded lecture notes of a mini-course whose objectives were to introduce the basic concepts, constructions and techniques of noncommutative geometry, as well as their uses as a framework for modelling quantum spacetime. Key mathematical approaches presented include operator algebras such as $C^*$-algebras, K-theory, spectral geometry, quantum groups, and deformation quantization. Physical application areas considered include string theory, quantum field theory, and the Standard Model, as well as certain condensed matter systems.

AI.tldr: 该论文介绍了非交换几何的基本概念、构造和技术，以及其在量子时空建模中的应用框架
AI.motivation: 为非交换几何这一数学领域提供系统介绍，展示其作为量子时空建模框架的物理应用价值
AI.method: 采用算子代数（如C*-代数）、K理论、谱几何、量子群和形变量子化等数学方法
AI.result: 建立了非交换几何与弦理论、量子场论、标准模型以及凝聚态物理系统的联系
AI.conclusion: 非交换几何为量子时空建模提供了强大的数学框架，在多个物理领域具有重要应用价值

title: The Projective Class Rings of Drinfeld doubles of pointed rank one Hopf algebras
summary: Let $\Bbbk$ be an algebraically closed field of characteristic $0$. In this paper, we study the Grothendieck ring $G_0(D(H_\mathcal{D}))$ and the projective class ring $r_p(D(H_\mathcal{D}))$ of the Drinfeld double $D(H_{\mathcal{D}})$ of the rank one pointed Hopf algebra $H_{\mathcal{D}}$. We analyze the tensor products of simple modules with simple modules, simple modules with indecomposable projective modules, and indecomposable projective modules with indecomposable projective modules, providing explicit decomposition rules in each case. Finally, we compute both the Grothendieck ring $G_0(D(H_\mathcal{D}))$ and the projective class ring $r_p(D(H_\mathcal{D}))$, and present these two rings in terms of generators and defining relations.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了秩一点Hopf代数Drinfeld双的Grothendieck环和射影类环，给出了张量积分解规则和环结构的具体描述。
AI.motivation: 研究Drinfeld双D(H_D)的表示理论，特别是其Grothendieck环和射影类环的结构，这对于理解该代数的表示范畴和模的张量积性质具有重要意义。
AI.method: 分析简单模与简单模、简单模与不可分解射影模、不可分解射影模与不可分解射影模之间的张量积，提供每种情况下的显式分解规则。
AI.result: 计算了Grothendieck环G_0(D(H_D))和射影类环r_p(D(H_D))，并用生成元和定义关系给出了这两个环的具体结构。
AI.conclusion: 成功确定了Drinfeld双D(H_D)的Grothendieck环和射影类环的完整代数结构，为理解该代数的表示理论提供了重要工具。

title: Full universal enveloping vertex algebras from factorisation
comment: 77 pages; v2: minor typos corrected and hyperlinks fixed; v3: substantially generalised setting and improved exposition, accepted for publication in Annales Henri Poincaré
summary: We give a systematic construction of the symmetries, or observables in the vacuum sector, of a full conformal field theory on an arbitrary real two-dimensional conformal manifold $Σ$. Specifically, we construct a prefactorisation algebra on $Σ$ which locally encodes the full (non-chiral) version $\mathbb{F}^{\mathfrak{a},α} = \mathbb{V}^{\mathfrak{a},α} \otimes \bar{\mathbb{V}}^{\mathfrak{a},α}$ of a universal enveloping vertex algebra $\mathbb{V}^{\mathfrak a,α}$, where $\mathfrak a$ is a finite-dimensional vector space labelling the set of fields and $α$ is a $2$-cocycle controlling the central extension of their Lie brackets. Our construction provides a unified treatment of the three canonical examples of (full) universal enveloping vertex algebras - Kac-Moody, Virasoro and $βγ$ system - using the notion of unital local Lie algebra. By using the coordinate-invariant nature of prefactorisation algebras we derive an analogue of Huang's change of variable formula for full vertex algebras. We give a careful treatment of (both Euclidean and Lorentzian) reality conditions in this formalism which allows us, in the Kac-Moody and Virasoro cases, to construct a Hermitian sesquilinear form on these full vertex algebras by using the factorisation product to the global observables on $S^2$. We also give an explicit derivation of Borcherds type identities and a construction of the operator formalism for $\mathbb{F}^{\mathfrak a,α}$.

AI.tldr: 该论文系统构建了任意二维共形流形上全共形场论的对称性/可观测量，通过预分解代数统一处理Kac-Moody、Virasoro和βγ系统三种典型例子。
AI.motivation: 为任意二维共形流形上的全共形场论提供系统化的对称性构造框架，统一处理不同类型的顶点代数，并建立坐标不变的形式化方法。
AI.method: 在共形流形Σ上构造预分解代数，局部编码全版本通用包络顶点代数𝔽^{𝔞,α}=𝕍^{𝔞,α}⊗𝕍̄^{𝔞,α}，利用单位局部李代数概念统一处理三种典型例子，推导坐标不变的变化公式。
AI.result: 成功构建了坐标不变的预分解代数框架，推导出全顶点代数的Huang变量变化公式类似物，在Kac-Moody和Virasoro情形构造了Hermitian半双线性形式，并推导了Borcherds型恒等式和算子形式化。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为二维共形场论提供了统一的数学框架，通过预分解代数方法系统处理对称性构造，实现了坐标不变性和不同类型顶点代数的统一描述。

title: Higher rank Nichols algebras of diagonal type with finite arithmetic root systems in positive characteristic
comment: arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1911.03555
summary: The classification of Nichols algebras is an essential step in the classification theory of pointed Hopf algebras by lifting method of N. Andruskiewitsch and H.-J. Schneider. Arithmetic root systems are invariants of Nichols algebras of diagonal type with a certain finiteness property. In this paper, all rank $r\geq 5$ Nichols algebras of diagonal type with a finite irreducible root system over fields of positive characteristic are classified. Weyl groupoids and finite arithmetic root systems are crucial tools for our classification.

AI.tldr: 本文对特征为正的域上具有有限不可约根系的所有秩r≥5的对角型Nichols代数进行了分类
AI.motivation: Nichols代数的分类是指尖Hopf代数提升方法分类理论的关键步骤，算术根系是对角型Nichols代数的重要不变量
AI.method: 使用Weyl群胚和有限算术根系作为关键工具，对秩r≥5的对角型Nichols代数进行分类
AI.result: 完成了特征为正的域上所有具有有限不可约根系的秩r≥5对角型Nichols代数的分类
AI.conclusion: 通过Weyl群胚和算术根系工具，成功实现了高秩对角型Nichols代数的分类，推进了Hopf代数分类理论
